title: What is a 'Domain List' or a "Form List'?
content:
Hello. I would like to download a pamphlet on a site, but I get this message when I try to do so:

"Cannot display form because this domain has not been added for use with Invisible reCAPTCHA. Please add the domain to your form or account domain list."

Is there someone who can assist me with finding the option to add the site to a 'domain' or 'form' list? I would be most appreciative. :) I have searched all over and come up with nothing.

Thank you, in advance.
creator: ima.little.teapot2

title: Faulure to Restore Previous Session
content: I lost a session with several open windows, and very valuable tabs. No idea why, Session Restore has been working well for months, and I restart frequently. Under History, Recently Closed Widows' is greyed, when 'Restore Last Session' is shown, (Forget how I got that, it's disappeared again) it's greyed too. Open Previous Windows was/is enabled under Startup in Preferences. Mac Mini, late 2012, up to date Firefox, 109.0.1, macOS 10.13.6 Safari window did Not disappear, it restored properly. Which it has been doing regularly, same as Firefox. I only struggle with Safari because streaming TV on the net (spectrum) works better for me on Safari, as do Imgur front page memes.

title: Vertical White Bar in Instagram Dark Mode
content:
Every time I enable Dark Mode on Instagram a white bar blocks a part of the right display. It's only a problem with the Dark Mode version of Instagram, Light Mode works fine. So far I've only encountered this issue with Instagram, I don't know what could be the cause of it. Tried it with different themes, still appeared.

I have provided 2 images, one in dark mode and the other in light mode. One can clearly see that the white bar isn't only aesthetic, but it also blocks a part of the UI.

title: Giriş Ekranı Kısayol Simgeleri
content: Giriş ekranındaki kısayol sitelerinin bazılarının simgeleri görünürken bazılarınki görünmüyor. Kısayol düzenleme seçeneğinden özel resim kullan seçeneği üzerinden bir resim belirleyebiliyorum ama tarayıcı ilk açıldığında bu sefer de gecikmeli geliyor simgeler. Bu da tam bir çözüm olmuyor. Sitelere girmek ve sonrasında tarayıcıyı kapatmak gibi seçeneklerle de düzelmiyor. Bunu diğer siteler gibi simgeleri almasını nasıl sağlayabilirim?

title: Firefox won't open
content:
When doing some online homework in Firefox, my computer froze. I couldn't move my mouse or open task manager or do anything. I had ~12 tabs open to my online homework and Discord and TextMaker (a free Word alternative) running as well. I hard shut off my PC by holding down the power button. Upon startup, FF won't open. I click the shortcut and my computer has the little loading circle next to the mouse for a second, but then it disappears and nothing happens. If I try to open a PDF in FF or click a link to open in FF, the same thing happens; a loading circle next to my mouse cursor and nothing. I refreshed FF to no avail. I reinstalled FF, and nothing. I restarted my PC, and still no dice. FF doesn't appear in my task manager when I click it.

I tried running the firefox.exe -P command in the run menu and the start menu to manage my profiles and the same thing happens, I get a loading circle by my mouse and nothing happens.

I really like FF and use it for my schoolwork. Can anyone help me troubleshoot?
creator: emilyolsen94

title: Print two pages per sheet of a same page number on same sheet.
content: I am using Ubuntu 14.04 and Firefox 88.0 (If I use higher version of firefox it used to crash continuously so I avoid higher versions.) When I used to give printout of multiple pages per sheet from LibreOffice with page numbers like 1,1,2,2 I get the desired result means copy of the page is printed on the same sheet. My problem is when I try to print from FireFox with multiple pages per sheet and page no. like 1,1 it only print the page no. 1 only once on the sheet and the remaining half sheet of the pdf remain blank.
